article_title: Republican presidential hopeful Walker brings regular-guy campaign to crowd in Rock Hill
article_text:
Gov. Scott Walker of Wisconsin spoke to more than 400 supporters at Rock Hill’s American Legion post

Walker is third in most polls behind Donald Trump and Jeb Bush

Walker hopes to garner conservatives in run for president in South Carolina’s first in South primary in early 2016

article_metadata.title: Republican presidential hopeful Walker brings regular-guy campaign to crowd in Rock Hill | The Charlotte Observer

og.description: Republican Party, blue-collar Republican presidential candidate Scott Walker of Wisconsin brought a regular-guy preacher’s son campaign to a huge packed house Sunday afternoon in Rock Hill.
